verses.verse: O God <WH430>, the heathen <WH1471> are come <WH935> into your inheritance <WH5159>; your holy <WH6944> temple <WH1964> have they defiled <WH2930>; they have laid <WH7760> Jerusalem <WH3389> in heaps <WH5856>.

The dead bodies <WH5038> of your servants <WH5650> have they given <WH5414> to be food <WH3978> unto the birds <WH5775> of the heaven <WH8064>, the flesh <WH1320> of your saints <WH2623> unto the animals <WH2416> of the earth <WH776>.
Their blood <WH1818> have they shed <WH8210> like water <WH4325> round about <WH5439> Jerusalem <WH3389>; and there was none to bury them <WH6912>.
We are become a reproach <WH2781> to our neighbors <WH7934>, a scorn <WH3933> and derision <WH7047> to them that are round about us <WH5439>.
How long <WH3068>, Lord? will you be angry <WH599> for ever <WH5331>? shall your jealousy <WH7068> burn <WH1197> like fire <WH784>?
Pour out <WH8210> your wrath <WH2534> upon the heathen <WH1471> that have not known <WH3045> you <WH4467>, and upon the kingdoms that have not called <WH7121> upon your name <WH8034>.
For they have devoured <WH398> Jacob <WH3290>, and laid waste <WH8074> his living place <WH5116>.
O remember <WH2142> not against us former <WH7223> iniquities <WH5771>: let your tender mercies <WH7356> speedily <WH4118> prevent <WH6923> us <WH1809>: for we are brought very <WH3966> low <WH1809>.

Help <WH5826> us <WH430>, O God of our salvation <WH3468>, for <WH1697> the glory <WH3519> of your name <WH8034>: and deliver <WH5337> us <WH3722>, and purge away our sins <WH2403>, for your name <WH8034>'s sake.

Therefore should the heathen <WH1471> say <WH559>, Where is their God <WH430>? let him be known <WH3045> among the heathen <WH1471> in our sight <WH5869> by the revenging <WH5360> of the blood <WH1818> of your servants <WH5650> which is shed <WH8210>.

Let the sighing <WH603> of the prisoner <WH615> come <WH935> before <WH6440> you <WH1433>; according to the greatness of your power <WH2220> preserve <WH3498> you those that are appointed <WH1121> to die <WH8546>;
And render <WH7725> unto our neighbors <WH7934> sevenfold <WH7659> into their bosom <WH2436> their reproach <WH2781>, with which they have reproached <WH2778> you <WH136>, O Lord.

So we your people <WH5971> and sheep <WH6629> of your pasture <WH4830> will give you thanks <WH3034> for ever <WH5769>: we will show forth <WH5608> your praise <WH8416> to all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>.
